result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Marquis J Sims not in court, in custody.  Attorney Joseph P Bastien V not in court.  Attorney Jessica Bellows not in court. 

Case is set for a Competency Hearing. Doctor requests an adjournment as they are ill and unable to appear for the hearing. Email correspondence is held off of the record with both parties. Both parties agreed to a new Competency Hearing date. New date is confirmed with the doctor's office by phone.
Competency hearing scheduled for December 9, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Received and Filed: Outpatient Competency Status Update

Defendant Marquis J Sims appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Joseph P Bastien V appeared by video for Marquis J Sims.  Attorney James C Griffin appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. 

Case in court for a Doctor's Report Return.  It is the opinion of Doctor Jenna Niess that Mr. Sims is NOT likely to attain competency within the permissible timeframe.  Mr. Sims has another pending matter (22CF2090) in front of Judge Kies, Branch 45, currently scheduled for a competency hearing.  Court scheduled this matter to be heard in Branch 45 for a competency hearing.  Case adjourned to Branch 45, Rm G55 CJF.
Competency hearing scheduled for October 25, 2022 at 01:15 pm.
Received and Filed.
Received and Filed.
Received and filed; forwarded to the Judge for review.
signed, Order of Commitment for Treatment

Defendant Marquis J Sims in court with attorney Joseph P Bastien.  Defendant Marquis J Sims in custody.  James C Griffin appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
Hearing held by Zoom. Case scheduled for return on doctor report. Parties stipulate to Court adopting findings of report filed on 06-24-2022 for 2022CF2090. 
Court finds: 
-defendant incompetent to proceed at this time, but if provided with appropriate medication and treatment, is likely to become competent within 12 months, or the maximum sentence specified for the most serious offinse, whichever is less.  
Court orders:
*proceedings suspended
*Defendant REMANDED into the custody of the Milwaukee County Sheriffs Department for transportation to the designated facility, forthwith. 

Case adjourned for return on doctor report, Branch 2.  Doctor's Report Return scheduled for September 30, 2022 at 08:45 am.

Pretrial Services Discharge Report 
in-custody status

Attorney Joseph P Bastien in court, defendant Marquis J Sims not in court, in custody.  James C Griffin appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
Hearing held via Zoom. Defense requests to schedule case for return on doctor report along with other pending case. Case adjourned, Branch 2 via Zoom.  Doctor's Report Return scheduled for July 13, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Marquis J Sims in court, appear by video with attorney Joseph P Bastien, appear ny video.  Defendant Marquis J Sims in custody.  Karine O'Byrne appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case set for a Preliminary Hearing. Parties are advised that this case is assigned to Branch 02, Judge Childs. Defendant waived Preliminary Hearing. Preliminary Hearing Questionnaire and Waiver received and filed. Court held colloquy with defendant. Probable cause has been found and the defendant is bound over for trial. Original Information e-filed, copy given to defense counsel who waived reading. Defense enters a plea of not guilty on behalf of the defendant. Case is adjourned to Br. 02.  Scheduling conference scheduled for July 8, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Pretrial Services Supervision Report
Pretrial Services Violation Report

Defendant Marquis J Sims not in court. Attorney Joseph P Bastien V appear by video.  Abby Rockendorf appeared in person for the State of Wisconsin. Case set for a preliminary hearing. State witness present. Attorney Bastien advised the court that the defendant is in custody at MPD. Court will imposed by stay bench warrant until the next date and ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for status in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for June 22, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Pretrial Services Supervision Report
Turnover to JP for level 3 monitoring and all previoulsy ordered conditions of bail.

Attorney Arial Jade Rosenberg in court, defendant Marquis J Sims not in court, in custody.  Amanda Korin Kirklewski appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
Return on bench warrant held. Bail hearing proceeded. State has no objection to defense request to reinstate bail. Court grants and orders $750.00 signature bond reinstated.  Case adjourned for preliminary hearing, Branch PE .  Preliminary hearing scheduled for May 24, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Pretrial Services DISCHARGE Report   received and filed
Signature bond ordered to be forfeited in the amount of 750.00.
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE JUDGE ON RETURN OF THE BENCH WARRANT.

11:42 AM Defendant Marquis J Sims not in court.  Abby Rockendorf appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case set for a preliminary hearing. States witness was present. The defendant having failed to appear, the court ordered a bench warrant to issue, any bond forfeited and Judgment of Bond Forfeiture 30 days after notification by the Clerk of Circuit Court.
Pretrial Services Supervision Report
Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with R.K.S; D.N.W and Marshall High School, 4141 N. 64th St., Milwaukee, WI
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 3. No driving without a valid license.

Defendant Marquis J Sims in court with attorney Stephen Andrew Sargent.  Defendant Marquis J Sims in custody.  Karine O'Byrne appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Marquis J Sims appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Childs, Branch 02.  Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.  
This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/99073afd-37c2-acfa-830d-b1ddcaebf0ea  Preliminary hearing scheduled for April 21, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
